dc_description_s: This point shapefile contains the locations of all landfills in the United States. This layer is a part of a collection of GIS data containing renewable and electric energy information for the U.S., including data on transmission lines, power plants and electricity substations. This shapefile can be used to locate and analyze existing landfill sites in the United States. This release is intended to replace all previous releases. This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
